data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Mandya, Karnataka, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Mandya, Karnataka, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,764,026 who are far from you in Mandya, Karnataka, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Mandya, Karnataka, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, move the 19,864 believers in the county of Mandya to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Adiyan people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Mandya, Karnataka, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 1,805,800 people living in Mandya.

data.section_summary:
the county of Mandya, Karnataka, India has a population of 1,805,800.

We estimate Mandya has 19,864 people who might know Jesus, 21,910 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,764,026 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Mandya.
